comments:
build 20020909

After update my JRE from 1.3.1 to 1.4.0 I start to get a internal error always 
when I try to synchronize with repository.
(that's true for extssh repository, but not for pserver).

This NPE is a result of poor exception handling. The root of the problem is a 
missing java encryption algorithm (MD5). I don't know why your JDK 1.4 is 
missing this.

How can I check if my JRE is missing this extension ?

I've just got this JRE from:
http://eclipsedrops.ott.oti.com/downloads/hubba/downloads/jdk/windows/jre140/ibm
-jre-n140p-win32-x86.zip

I get this same exception with this drop. We will need to investigate this. In 
the mean time you will either need to use the older JDK or the ext connection 
method and an external ssh tool.

This looks like a possible 1.4.0 bug.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23941 ***
